Creator Benefits: A 'Creator' can also upload: documents, audio, video and PDF content, create multimedia program packages, audio guides, and connect content by different Creators.
Creator BenefitsFR: (FR) Un 'Creator' peut également télécharger : des documents, du contenu audio, vidéo et PDF, créer des packages de programmes multimédias, des audioguides et connecter des contenus de différents 'Creators.
UserBenefits: A 'User' can make and share multimedia playlists.
userGuideLoginPage: Wondering which profile to choose? Or need help logging in? Press play for a audio/video guide.
userGuideLoginAccountDescription: A 'User' can make and share multimedia playlists. A 'Creator' can also upload: documents, audio, video and PDF content.
userGuideLoginAccountDescriptionFR: (FR) 'Users' peuvent créer des 'Playlists' multimédia. 'Creators' peuvent également télécharger du contenu.
